hanzi-su-wiki:
謀

Значения

Замысел, план, хитрость; планировать, замышлять, обманывать

Мнемоника

Некие 某 слова 言 для интимного круга лиц, закулисные переговоры, хитрости, интриги.

Варианты

谋
purpleculture_pinyin:
móu
to plan; to seek; scheme
планировать; искать; схема

謀謀RS
谋谋		plan, scheme, strategem, conspire
  • words 言 for getting fruits off a tree 某: plan or conspiracy
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 谋)
Pictophonetic: 某 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
謀求 [ móu qiú ]: to seek; to strive for
謀劃 [ móu huà ]: to scheme; to plot; conspiracy
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 某 [ mǒu ] some, someone; a certain thing or person
heisig_chinese_memo: I imagine some girls schemeing against another girl...they are exchanging lots of words, chatting about how so-and-so girl is now up to such-and-such (gasp!), and how they will spread the word about it.
heisig_constituent: conspire, say, words, keitai, mouth, so-and-so, sweet, wicker basket, picnic basket, tree, wood
Keyword_KANJIDIC: conspire, cheat, impose on, plan, devise, scheme, have in mind, deceive
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Заговора, обмануть, навязать, план, разработать, схемы, иметь в виду, вводить в заблуждение
koohiiStory1: I imagine a clique of catty girls conspiring against a another girl...they are exchanging lots of words, chatting about how so-and-so girl is now up to such-and-such (gasp!), and how they will spread the word about it.
koohiiStory2: You might hear the words of someone conspiring... "If you do so-and-so...".
kunYomi: はか.る、たばか.る、はかりごと
jp_readingExamples: 謀略 (ぼうりゃく), 無謀 (むぼう), 首謀者 (しゅぼうしゃ), 謀る (はか.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Watch what you say to what appears to be a sweet tree, because that tree will 100% conspire against you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Trees may look all sweet and innocent, like they aren't listening to every word you say, but it's a front! They're conspiring against you!! They'll blackmail you and take everything!!!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now you're getting it! That tree is trying to conspire against you and take you down. Take your bowling (ぼう) ball and bowl it and all its friends down!
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Watch as the conspiratorial tree and all it's gossiping friends are bowled over by your bowling ball. Phew. You're safe from the trees.
For now.
Ru_Meaning: conspire, cheat, impose on, plan, devise, scheme, have in mind, deceive
Ru_trainchinese: móu: (глаг) искать, добиваться; планировать, замышлять; советоваться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a certain (某) few words (言) can turn into your plan
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you want to scheme you can't use names in your words.  You can only refer to your partners as such-and-such.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " words " and " some ", it means plot and calculation. "Shuowen": "It's hard to worry about making things. Congyan, a certain sound." "Zuo Zhuan‧ The Eighth Years of Xianggong": "The son of Zheng Qun is looking for a son with the death of Xie Gong."

" Plan " may represent a plan, strategy. "Shu‧Da Yumo": "Don't listen to nonsense, don't try to inquire."

" Measuring " also means planning and negotiation. "Poetry·Weifeng·Mang": "The chichi of the gangster, hold the cloth trade silk, the bandits come to trade silk, come and I will plan." Gao Heng's note: "Plot, refer to the matter of marriage."

" Mu " also means inspection and inspection. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Si Xuan Fu"": "Shen Kui is ignorant of its difficulties, and it is difficult to overcome it."

" Planning " also means meeting and conflict. "Three Kingdoms·Shu Zhi·Xianzhu Biography": "In the early days of the Han Dynasty, the five-star plan was based on the stars.

" Plan " also refers to consultation. "The Four Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The minister heard that visiting Yushan was for counseling, consulting relatives was for consulting, counseling was for salvation, counseling was for guilt, and consulting was difficult.

" Measuring " can also mean ambiguity. "Guan Zi‧ Neiye": "You can't hear the sound of seeking, and death lies in the heart."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " words " and " some ", it means plot and calculation.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「某」聲，表示圖謀、算計。《說文》：「慮難曰謀。从言，某聲。」《左傳‧襄公八年》：「鄭群公子以僖公之死也，謀子駟。」

　　「謀」可表示計策、謀略。《書‧大禹謨》：「無稽之言勿聽，弗詢之謀勿庸。」

　　「謀」也表示計議、商議。《詩‧衛風‧氓》：「氓之蚩蚩，抱布貿絲，匪來貿絲，來即我謀。」高亨注：「謀，指計議結婚之事。」

　　「謀」還表示審察、考察。《文選‧張衡〈思玄賦〉》：「神逵昧其難覆兮，疇克謀而從諸。」舊注：「謀，察也。」

　　「謀」亦指會合、抵觸。《三國志‧蜀志‧先主傳》：「近漢初興，五星從歲星謀。」

　　「謀」還指咨詢。《左傳‧襄公四年》：「臣聞之，訪問於善為咨，咨親為詢，咨禮為度，咨事為諏，咨難為謀。」

　　「謀」也可指暗昧不明。《管子‧內業》：「謀乎莫聞其音，卒乎乃在於心。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「某」聲，表示圖謀、算計。

①計劃，計策，主意：計謀。出謀劃策。
②設法尋求：謀求。圖謀。謀面。謀篇。謀生。謀幸福。
③商議：謀議。謀劃。不謀而合。
④姓氏。

從「 言 」，「 某 」聲，表示圖謀、算計。《說文》：「慮難曰謀。从言，某聲。」《左傳‧襄公八年》：「鄭群公子以僖公之死也，謀子駟。」 「 謀 」可表示計策、謀略。《書‧大禹謨》：「無稽之言勿聽，弗詢之謀勿庸。」 「 謀 」也表示計議、商議。《詩‧衛風‧氓》：「氓之蚩蚩，抱布貿絲，匪來貿絲，來即我謀。」高亨注：「謀，指計議結婚之事。」 「 謀 」還表示審察、考察。《文選‧張衡〈思玄賦〉》：「神逵昧其難覆兮，疇克謀而從諸。」舊注：「謀，察也。」 「 謀 」亦指會合、抵觸。《三國志‧蜀志‧先主傳》：「近漢初興，五星從歲星謀。」 「 謀 」還指咨詢。《左傳‧襄公四年》：「臣聞之，訪問於善為咨，咨親為詢，咨禮為度，咨事為諏，咨難為謀。」 「 謀 」也可指暗昧不明。《管子‧內業》：「謀乎莫聞其音，卒乎乃在於心。」
From the sound of " words" and " some", it means plot and calculation. "Shuowen": "It's hard to worry about making things. Congyan, a certain sound." "Zuo Zhuan‧ The Eighth Years of Xianggong": "The son of Zheng Qun is looking for a son with the death of Xie Gong." " Plan" may represent a plan, strategy. "Shu‧Da Yumo": "Don't listen to nonsense, don't try to inquire." " Measuring" also means planning and negotiation. "Poetry·Weifeng·Mang": "The chichi of the gangster, hold the cloth trade silk, the bandits come to trade silk, come and I will plan." Gao Heng's note: "Plot, refer to the matter of marriage." " Mu" also means inspection and inspection. "Selected Works‧Zhang Heng "Si Xuan Fu"": "Shen Kui is ignorant of its difficulties, and it is difficult to overcome it." " Planning" also means meeting and conflict. "Three Kingdoms·Shu Zhi·Xianzhu Biography": "In the early days of the Han Dynasty, the five-star plan was based on the stars. " Plan" also refers to consultation. "The Four Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The minister heard that visiting Yushan was for counseling, consulting relatives was for consulting, counseling was for salvation, counseling was for guilt, and consulting was difficult. " Measuring" can also mean ambiguity. "Guan Zi‧ Neiye": "You can't hear the sound of seeking, and death lies in the heart."

móu
вм. 谋
Radicals: 言, 甘, 木  (say, sweet, tree)
Meaning Mnemonic
Watch what you say to what appears to be a sweet tree, because that tree will 100% conspire against you.
Trees may look all sweet and innocent, like they aren't listening to every word you say, but it's a front! They're conspiring against you!! They'll blackmail you and take everything!!!
Reading Mnemonic
Now you're getting it! That tree is trying to conspire against you and take you down. Take your bowling (ぼう) ball and bowl it and all its friends down!
Watch as the conspiratorial tree and all it's gossiping friends are bowled over by your bowling ball. Phew. You're safe from the trees.
For now.
